survey_name: Customer Satisfaction with Subscription-Based Meal Planning Services Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to gather feedback from customers who use subscription-based meal planning services to understand their satisfaction levels, preferences, and areas for improvement.

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with your current subscription-based meal planning service?

questions.client_notes: Use a Likert scale for measuring satisfaction. Ensure the scale is balanced and mobile-friendly.
